name: Little White Case
description:
A mysterious bot has you fetch a small, white cassette and bring it to him.  He then asks you to fetch a Black Tape for him.  Help the other bots in the world to find out where the Black Tape is.

WASD to move, mouse to look and interact.

This game was created for the Brackeyes Game Jam 2020-2 which had the theme of Rewind.  I've wanted to make a looping game like this for a while, so it's been a thrill working with the system for this jam.
